title: [GAMEPLAY AND CLIENT] SEVERE CONNECTIVITY ISSUES
body:
I am currently (as of right now) experiencing severe connectivity issues, hwile not having internet conenction problems. While I was in my last game, I got "Attempting to Reconnect" every 2 minutes or so. I still could see everyone moving, but no animations of damage, death, and other typical "connectivity issue" symptoms. I had to manually quit and reconnect a few times. Then I got disconnected right at the end of the game.

And I couldn't see if it counted as a win (because the last thing I saw before another DC, was their surrender vote), or it counted as a leave, because when I went into client, it disconnected me from chat, and now I cannot login. I couldn't report Rammus that was flaming me the whole game, I cou;dn't see what grade I got in the game (it is definitely not an S, but still).

Logged into boards to see my match history. Shows as a win.

Please help. Currently cannot login into client.

replies.body: It sounds like there is an unstable connection with your network trying to reach our servers.  Check out the following[ Connection Troubleshoot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.
